# Focused on the Mission
## Scripture
"Do not be conformed to this world, but be transformed by the renewal of your mind, that by testing you may discern what is the will of God, what is good and acceptable and perfect." â€“ Romans 12:2
## Reflection
As men, we often get distracted by the world around us. We let our priorities be shaped by what others think we should do, rather than seeking God's will. But as Warriors of Christ, we must be focused on the mission God has given us. We must be transformed by the renewal of our minds, constantly seeking to understand and obey God's will. This isn't about trying to be better than others, but about being faithful to the call of God on our lives. Let's not be swayed by the world's influences, but instead, let's be transformed by the power of the Holy Spirit.

## Daily Challenge
"Run 5 miles while praying for clarity and focus in your mission from God."
